dependencies.description:
BCFtools is a set of utilities that manipulate variant calls in the
Variant Call Format (VCF) and its binary counterpart BCF. All commands
work transparently with both VCFs and BCFs, both uncompressed and BGZF-
compressed.
dependencies.name: bcftools

dependencies.description:
Collectively, the bedtools utilities are a swiss-army knife of tools for
a wide-range of genomics analysis tasks. The most widely-used tools
enable genome arithmetic: that is, set theory on the genome.
dependencies.name: bedtools2

dependencies.description:
BLAT (BLAST-like alignment tool) is a pairwise sequence alignment
algorithm.
dependencies.name: blat

dependencies.description: Burrow-Wheeler Aligner for pairwise alignment between DNA sequences.
dependencies.name: bwa

dependencies.description:
bzip2 is a freely available, patent free high-quality data compressor.
It typically compresses files to within 10% to 15% of the best available
techniques (the PPM family of statistical compressors), whilst being
around twice as fast at compression and six times faster at
decompression.
dependencies.name: bzip2

dependencies.description:
A tool designed to provide fast all-in-one preprocessing for FastQ
files.
dependencies.name: fastp

dependencies.description: A quality control tool for high throughput sequence data.
dependencies.name: fastqc

dependencies.description:
Git is a free and open source distributed version control system
designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with
speed and efficiency.
dependencies.name: git

dependencies.description:
GMAP: A Genomic Mapping and Alignment Program for mRNA and EST
Sequences, and GSNAP: Genomic Short-read Nucleotide Alignment Program
dependencies.name: gmap-gsnap

dependencies.description: C library for high-throughput sequencing data formats.
dependencies.name: htslib

dependencies.description:
Heavily optimized library for DEFLATE/zlib/gzip compression and
decompression
dependencies.name: libdeflate

dependencies.description:
The bx-python project is a python library and associated set of scripts
to allow for rapid implementation of genome scale analyses.
dependencies.name: py-bx-python

dependencies.description: Fisher's Exact Test. Simple, fast implementation of Fisher's exact test.
dependencies.name: py-fisher

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A python module for reading, manipulating and writing genomic data sets.
dependencies.name: py-pysam

dependencies.description:
Change Python (.py) files to use 4-space indents and no hard tab
characters. Also trim excess spaces and tabs from ends of lines, and
remove empty lines at the end of files. Also ensure the last line ends
with a newline.
dependencies.name: py-reindent

dependencies.description:
RSeQC package provides a number of useful modules that can
comprehensively evaluate high throughput sequence data especially RNA-
seq data.
dependencies.name: py-rseqc

dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-scipy

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.
dependencies.name: py-wheel

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description:
SAM Tools provide various utilities for manipulating alignments in the
SAM format, including sorting, merging, indexing and generating
alignments in a per-position format
dependencies.name: samtools

dependencies.description: STAR is an ultrafast universal RNA-seq aligner.
dependencies.name: star

dependencies.description: Generic indexer for TAB-delimited genome position files
dependencies.name: tabix

dependencies.description:
GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP,
HTTPS and FTP, the most widely-used Internet protocols. It is a non-
interactive commandline tool, so it may easily be called from scripts,
cron jobs, terminals without X-Windows support, etc.
dependencies.name: wget

description:
REDItools: python scripts for RNA editing detection by RNA-Seq data.
REDItools are simple python scripts conceived to facilitate the
investigation of RNA editing at large-scale and devoted to research
groups that would to explore such phenomenon in own data but don't have
sufficient bioinformatics skills. They work on main operating systems
(although unix/linux-based OS are preferred), can handle reads from
whatever platform in the standard BAM format and implement a variety of
filters.
name: reditools

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Install the Nature Protocol scripts and files
variants.name: nature_protocol
